summary: Diff focuses on adding frontend error handling/auth UI changes and substantial new backend domain logic (profiles/publishers), but it does not show any build/deploy retry, captured deployment error output, or targeted minimal fix explicitly tied to a deployment failure. Several changes appear to be new product functionality unrelated to resolving a deployment failure.

missing_requirements.requirement: Retry the build + deployment using the existing ICP build/deploy templates and current project configuration, targeting the same environment/canisters as the previous failed attempt.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains only code/config changes (frontend/backend). There is no evidence of a deployment retry run, nor any changes to deploy templates/config to ensure targeting the same environment/canisters.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the deployment fails again, capture the full error output (including the failing command and stack trace/logs) and implement the minimal project change(s) needed to resolve the root cause, then re-run deployment until it succeeds.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment logs/error output are included in the diff summary, and no changes are clearly identified as a minimal fix for a specific captured deployment error (failing command/stack trace not shown).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new React ErrorBoundary component with a full-screen fallback UI and reload button.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is about retrying deployment and fixing underlying deployment error; adding a user-facing error boundary is a new UX feature and not explicitly requested as a minimal root-cause fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded backend domain functionality: user profile system (get/save profiles) with authorization checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; appears as new product functionality unrelated to deployment retry/fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded backend publisher management system (addPublisher, getPublisher, togglePublisherActiveState, getAllPublishers) with authorization checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; constitutes new application functionality beyond resolving deployment failure.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend app routing and auth-state UI (TanStack Router routes, auth error screen, multiple feature routes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; these are application feature/UI changes rather than evidence of deployment error resolution.

hallucinated_features.description: Added frontend environment configuration setting VITE_II_URL to https://identity.ic0.app.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; changes runtime configuration and could be considered an auth/config adjustment rather than a documented minimal fix tied to captured deployment error output.
